entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late in the evening and overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
